text: The Meridiana Tunnel is a railway tunnel in the Spanish city of Barcelona. Built in the 1970s, it replaced the previously existing railway that ran in a cutting in the middle of Avinguda Meridiana through the city centre. ==Services== The tunnel is served by Rodalies de Catalunya services R1, R3, R4 and R7. ==Stations== *Barcelona Sants *Plaça de Catalunya *Arc de Triomf *La Sagrera-Meridiana *Sant Andreu Arenal ==See also== *Aragó Tunnel ==References== Category:Transport in Barcelona Category:Underground commuter rail
title: Meridiana Tunnel
